channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "The future of Ruby is faster"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "The future of Ruby is faster"

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description:
As you please - it's your proposal after all!

:)

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: I've been a Rubinius contributor for the last 5 years and have been working a lot on performance lately. Should I update the proposal with this information?

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description:
Can you provide a little background regarding your experience in order to be able to understand a little better the expertise level?

P.S.: Definitely voting up for this!!!
